description.english: Complete a level without killing anybody
description.german: Schließe einen Level ab, ohne jemanden zu töten.
description.french: Finir un niveau sans faire de victimes
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin matar a nadie.
description.schinese: 完成一关而不杀一人
description.tchinese: 在不殺人的情況下完成任意關卡
description.japanese: 誰も殺さずにレベルをクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete um nível sem matar ninguém.

description.english: Complete a level having killed everyone
description.german: Schließe einen Level ab und töte alle.
description.french: Finir un niveau après avoir tué tout le monde
description.spanish: Completa un nivel matando a todos.
description.schinese: 完成一关并杀光所有人
description.tchinese: 在殺死所有人的情況下完成任意關卡
description.japanese: 全員殺してレベルをクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete um nível matando todos.

description.english: Complete a level without alerting any enemies
description.german: Schließe einen Level ab, ohne Feinde zu alarmieren.
description.french: Finir un niveau sans alerter le moindre ennemi
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin alertar a ningún enemigo.
description.schinese: 完成一关而不惊动任何敌人
description.tchinese: 在不驚動任何敵人的情況下完成任意關卡
description.russian: Завершить уровень, не поднимая тревогу среди врагов.
description.japanese: 敵に一切気づかれずにレベルをクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete um nível sem alertar nenhum inimigo.

description.english: Complete a level without taking damage
description.german: Schließe einen Level ab, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Finir un niveau sans subir de dégâts
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin recibir daño.
description.schinese: 完成一关而不受任何伤害
description.tchinese: 在沒有受到任何傷害的情況下完成任意關卡
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにレベルをクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete um nível sem sofrer dano.

description.english: Complete a level without using any abilities
description.german: Schließe einen Level ab, ohne Fähigkeiten zu verwenden.
description.french: Finir un niveau sans utiliser de capacités
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin usar ninguna habilidad.
description.schinese: 完成一关而不使用任何能力
description.tchinese: 在不使用任何技能的情況下完成任意關卡
description.japanese: 能力を一切使わずにレベルをクリアする
description.brazilian: Complete um nível sem usar nenhuma habilidade.

description.english: Hit the same enemy with a smoke grenade, a shock bolt, and your baton
description.german: Triff denselben Feind mit einer Rauchgranate, einem Schockbolzen und deinem Schlagstock.
description.french: Toucher le même ennemi avec une grenade fumigène, un projectile électrique et votre matraque
description.spanish: Golpea al mismo enemigo con una granada de humo, un dardo eléctrico y la porra.
description.schinese: 用烟雾弹、电击枪和甩棍击中同一敌人
description.tchinese: 使用煙霧彈、震擊標槍和警棍命中同一個敵人
description.russian: Попасть по одному и тому же врагу дымовой шашкой, разрядом и дубинкой.
description.japanese: 1人の敵に発煙手榴弾、ショックボルト、警棒でヒットを与える
description.brazilian: Acerte o mesmo inimigo com uma granada de fumaça, um dardo de choque e seu bastão.

description.english: Kill two enemies with one shotgun blast
description.german: Töte zwei Gegner mit einem Schrotflintenschuss.
description.french: Tuer deux ennemis en un seul coup de fusil à pompe
description.spanish: Mata a dos enemigos con un disparo de escopeta.
description.schinese: 用霰弹枪一枪杀死两个敌人
description.tchinese: 使用霰彈槍一擊消滅兩個敵人
description.russian: Убить двух врагом одним выстрелом из дробовика.
description.japanese: １回のショットガンの発砲で敵2人を殺す
description.brazilian: Mate dois inimigos com um tiro de espingarda.

displayName.japanese: インビジブルアタック

description.english: Knock out an investigating enemy while invisible
description.german: Schlage einen suchenden Feind bewusstlos, während du unsichtbar bist.
description.french: Assommer un ennemi à votre recherche en étant invisible
description.spanish: Noquea a un enemigo que esté investigando mientras eres invisible.
description.schinese: 在隐身状态下干掉一个正在调查的敌人
description.tchinese: 在隱身狀態下擊倒一名起疑心的敵人
description.russian: Вырубить врага, ведущего поиск, пока вы находитесь в состоянии невидимости.
description.japanese: 透明になっている間に調査中の敵をノックアウトする
description.brazilian: Nocauteie um inimigo desconfiado enquanto estiver invisível.

description.english: Collect all the Upgrade Kits in the game
description.german: Sammle alle Upgrade-Kits im Spiel.
description.french: Ramasser tous les kits d’amélioration du jeu
description.spanish: Consigue todos los kits de mejora del juego.
description.schinese: 收集游戏中的所有升级套件
description.tchinese: 取得遊戲中的所有升級包
description.russian: Собрать все комплекты для улучшения в игре.
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべてのアップグレードキットを回収する
description.brazilian: Colete todos os kits de melhoria no jogo.

description.english: Collect all the Lore items in the game
description.german: Sammle alle Schriftstücke im Spiel.
description.french: Ramasser tous les objets d’Histoire du jeu
description.spanish: Consigue todos los coleccionables de historia del juego.
description.schinese: 收集游戏中的所有知识点物品
description.tchinese: 收集遊戲中的所有故事道具
description.russian: Собрать в игре все предметы с информацией.
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべてのロアアイテムを回収する
description.brazilian: Colete todos os itens de conhecimento no jogo.

displayName.french: Morte, elle ne me servira à rien
displayName.spanish: No me sirves de nada muerta

description.english: Spare Mara Bishop
description.german: Verschone Mara Bishop.
description.french: Épargner Mara Bishop
description.spanish: Perdónale la vida a Mara Bishop.
description.schinese: 放过玛拉·毕晓普
description.tchinese: 放過瑪拉·畢肖普
description.japanese: マラ司教を生かす
description.brazilian: Poupe Mara Bishop.

description.english: Kill Mara Bishop
description.german: Töte Mara Bishop.
description.french: Tuer Mara Bishop
description.spanish: Mata a Mara Bishop.
description.schinese: 杀死玛拉·毕晓普
description.tchinese: 殺死瑪拉·畢肖普
description.japanese: マラ司教を殺す
description.brazilian: Mate Mara Bishop.

description.english: Side with Mara Bishop
description.german: Schlag dich auf Mara Bishops Seite.
description.french: Collaborer avec Mara Bishop
description.spanish: Ponte de parte de Mara Bishop.
description.schinese: 与玛拉·毕晓普结盟
description.tchinese: 支持瑪拉·畢肖普
description.japanese: マラ司教に肩入れする
description.brazilian: Alie-se a Mara Bishop.

description.english: Accept Bribe from Mara Bishop
description.german: Nimm das Schmiergeld von Mara Bishop an.
description.french: Accepter un pot-de-vin de Mara Bishop
description.spanish: Acepta el soborno de Mara Bishop.
description.schinese: 接受玛拉·毕晓普的贿赂
description.tchinese: 接受瑪拉的賄賂
description.japanese: マラ司教から賄賂を受け取る
description.brazilian: Aceite o suborno de Mara Bishop

description.english: Complete the game without killing anybody

description.spanish: Completa el juego sin matar a nadie.

description.tchinese: 在不殺人的情況下完成遊戲

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo sem matar ninguém.
